definition: to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: All the tools have been handed in.
It’s unlocking all this great potential that the kids have.
sentences.chinese: 機器人能把孩子們全部巨大潛力盡數釋放出來。

sentences.english: He was joined by all the members of his second-tier management team.
sentences.chinese: 他手下的全體中層管理人員也盡數出席了此次宴會。

sentences.english: Almost all the cadres from southern Hunan are doing Party work in the army.
sentences.chinese: 湘南來的工作人員，幾乎盡數在軍中做黨的工作。

definition: to be shocked/to be appalled/to be terrified
lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence
to gain nothing/to end up empty-handed
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
to cry piteously/anguished wailing/same as 哀嚎
overwhelmed with shock, horror or amazement/dumbstruck/aghast
to march straight in unchallenged (military) (idiom)/(fig.) to push deep into the heart of sth/to flood in
